short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PorchShip makes returns even easier than purchases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After you install our extension, go to Amazon.com and process the return you always do. At the bottom you will see button "Ready for pickup". Click it if you want your return to be picked up by PorchShip. For more information visit our website.
